nl.strohalm.cyclos.dao

Interface IndexedDAO<E extends Entity & Indexable>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdDAO, ElementDAO, MemberRecordDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdDAOImpl, ElementDAOImpl, IndexedDAOImpl, MemberRecordDAOImpl

    public interface IndexedDAO<E extends Entity & Indexable>
    DAO interface for DAO's that are indexed for full text searches
